name: Paintball Wars (Robstruck15)
description:
--------------------------------  Paintball Wars ---------------------------------------
                                   A Robstruck15 Game
         [Arrow Keys] Move Gun        [WSAD] Move
                 [Space] Shoot              [Menu] Go to Menu
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 How to start playing:
Type in your username, leave it blank for the pre-generated username
Click [Online] or [Singleplayer] to start playing, use W,S,A and D to move around the map, use the arrow keys to move the gun, space to shoot. Be the best!
